mapper.select: SELECT l.LT_NUM , l.LT_TTL , find_code(LT_CATE_CD) LT_CATE_CD , l.LECTURER_NUM , m.MEM_NUM , t.TLSN_NUM , t.TLSN_ST_CD , t.CETE_YN_CD , t.APPL_DT FROM TLSN t JOIN LT l ON t.LT_NUM = l.LT_NUM JOIN MEM m ON t.MEM_NUM = m.MEM_NUM ORDER BY t.APPL_DT

SELECT l.LT_NUM , l.LT_TTL , find_code(LT_CATE_CD) LT_CATE_CD , l.LECTURER_NUM , m.MEM_NUM , t.TLSN_NUM , t.TLSN_ST_CD , t.CETE_YN_CD , t.APPL_DT FROM TLSN t JOIN LT l ON t.LT_NUM = l.LT_NUM JOIN MEM m ON t.MEM_NUM = m.MEM_NUM ORDER BY t.APPL_DT
